title: Jester

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- When not winding: Follow a player.
- When fully unwound: Deal a Rampage Unstoppable attack to a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When following a player, you start to unwind if that player targets or visits you.
- The day after you start to unwind, it is publicly announced that a Jester is unwinding. If you are not killed after two days, you become fully unwound.
- Being roleblocked or controlled prevents you from starting to unwind, or if you already started to, your unwinding is delayed by one day.
